title: Credit Suisse CEO Calls Takeover Talk ‘Really Stupid’
sub_head: Thomas Gottstein is under pressure from investors to show that the bank has a credible strategy after a spate of scandals and financial losses
body:
Credit Suisse Group AG Chief Executive Thomas Gottstein said a report that the bank could be taken over by State Street Corp . was “really stupid” and that it can repair itself.
The CEO is under pressure from investors to show that the bank has a credible strategy after a spate of scandals and financial losses. On Wednesday, Credit Suisse warned it is likely to report its third consecutive quarterly loss because of a sharp fall in investment-banking deals such as companies raising new stock and bonds. It said it would speed up cost-cutting plans.
